post.body: LOL, b/c Santa had to come to the house of course! Merry Christmas!
A fenced in backyard, lol. It just started a downpour and I hate muddy pawprints!
Dang, how come? I asked for a wii so i could get the wii fit thing. i want to do yoga!
Really? It's only supposed to retail at $10.99 at the most. Go figure. I hope you enjoy it though.
On the other hand, I think I may be getting a wii fo xmas, sooo I think TFU and LD will be my first 2 purchases.
You and me both!
Don't worry too much LMB, it is after all, the season of forgiving!
His law is love and his gospel is peace. Happy Christmas, everyone!
The power is out at my house, so I'm stealing internets from the neighbors. I also don't know how to get my power back. Merry Xmas to me.
Packing for the schlep tm, then sleepy time. I wish everyone a very, merry Christmas. I'll hold off on the ' happy new year' ; )
My house is in utter chaos. I'm beginning to have a bad feeling about this.
Ps. These animals are the perfect holiday accessory: They are traditional reindeer herders. Plus they match my outfit :)

Going to go pick up three of these: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samoyed_(dog)
Say a little prayer for my car!
(cont.) the fact that the parents, to me, set the kids up like a display at the zoo. It kills me.
Is it wrong of me to feel slight disgust for the Duggar family? There is a marathon on tv and I can't stop watching! My disgust stems from
My comcast is acting hinky. All I really want to do is take a baseball bat to the converter.
Finally awake! I love sleeping in. Now, for some exercise...

Can't sleep, but here is my Christmas gift for y'all: http://tinyurl.com/9ddujc
You guys are so welcome!
I hope everyone feels better tm, and to all a good night!
Update: The bug has been terminated w/ extreme prejudice by the snapping jaws of a dog. Here's hoping it wasn't poisonous!
